article_node.title: OpenAI's Chip Ambitions & Fed Bets Drive Stocks
article_node.summary: The S&P 500 reached a record high as signs of a cooling U.S. labor market strengthen expectations of a Fed rate cut. Broadcom surged after announcing a $10 billion partnership with OpenAI to design accelerator chips, positioning it to compete with Nvidia. Meanwhile, the French Prime Minister is holding last‑ditch meetings ahead of a confidence vote that could threaten the government’s stability.
